item.title: Steam Deck Beta Client Update: April 22nd
item.content:encoded:
Apr 22, 2024
We have just shipped an updated Steam Deck Client to the Preview/Beta channel.

General
  • Fixed slow startup on busy systems

Remote Play
  • Fixed the streaming button staying stuck on "Stop" when the streaming client exits quickly
